Html:
Hi there!


Awesome application!  I am just having a small difficulty that I'm not able to determine the cause of.

I'm using the hot build version, Windows Forms app, have set 'CanDragMap' to true, and am able to drag the map (a google map in this instance) successfully.  However, if I use a slider control to set zoom (gMap.Zoom = zoomSlider.Value), the map will zoom fine, but will no longer refresh when I drag it.  OnPositionChanged() still gets called, and if I zoom again, the newly redrawed map will be centered on the new 'drag' position.  I've tried this with different map providers and the behavior is the same.  I have added a call to Refresh() in the OnPositionChanged event to no avail.

Thoughts?

Thanks!!

Bob
yes, it's know issue in 1.7 version, only integer zoom levels works correctly
Dang! I knew it was something I did but couldn't correlate with moving to the float zoom levels.  Thanks for the info!!!
